post.body:
things i've learned from the internet:
- there's always someone weirder than you
- if you can imagine it, there is porn about it
-if you sare not getting flamed, you're doing it wrong
-there are still nazis in the world, but they are all anonymous cowards and they hang out it /pol
- no one gives a shit
- someone will try to make a buck by conning you
- everything turns to shit once someone finds how to advertise on it

comment.body: Tough competition therem being right next to Maduro and Chavez;s legacy plus the bunch of mini-mes the actively fed and watered like Evo and whats his name in peru. Think all of that is fucked up? we're getting our own chavez-style  megalomaniac in ,mx whose stated intentions are to fuck up the progress made in the last 18 years!

"Pobre de mi Mexico, tan lejos de Dios y tan cerca de los EE. UU."
("Woe un to my Mexico, so far from God and so close to the U.S.")
- Porfirio Diaz
